Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great place , authentic pizza , quality ingredients and exceptional customer service.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: I have been wanting to try their ricotta stuffed pizza for a while now and since I live super near by I decided to make my way here. The place is super nice and cozy and gives a very homey vibe. They have great staff and the pizza was not ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: We LOVED Sotto! From starter to dessert, the food was so high quality and absolutely delicious! Would definitely come here again when back in Amsterdam.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: By far the best pizza in Amsterdam! Highly recommended! The staff is also very friendly and helpful. 10/10!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The only reason this place pulls crowd is, it is at prime location and with closures people don't have choices in nearby area. The pizza was mediocre for amount of price we paid. Staff was unmasked and had no regard for customer safety. In ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Fine place for a pizza. However, outside you can't sit with a back rest so it's not very comfortable. Service is good and the pizza was nice. We did find the dough quite salty.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: I am Indian, Mind blowing beautiful cosy place. They serve really fresh Pasta, delicious.  I ordered two varieties of veg pasta and what a delight . Staff was really kind and helpful. Thank you we had a great time

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Amazing pizza and customer service. Terrace lovely, but might be better during lunch time because because the sun is not facing the terrace for during dinner time. Definitely go there again!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: It was really great.  Sotto has a good vibe not only the food but also the atmosphere. But mine was little salty in genaral(even the pizza dough).

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: if you are a lover of traditional Neapolitan pizza, this is the place to go...it's not an exaggeration what I say, but it's the best pizza in Amsterdamüëå

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Excellent authentic Italian Neapolitan style pizza. Wood fired oven, olive oil from Italy, Italian 00 caputo flour, are all why this pizza is so excellent. The dough is soft and chewy like it should be. I would eat here every day if I ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great attentive service, delicious pizza, clean and fun atmosphere.  Recommend the carnivals salisicca if you are looking for the star effect on your pizza.  Not one for those that don‚Äôt like ricotta, but authentic all the same.  Would definitely come back!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text:
Nice Location, Friendly Staff, Terrible Gum Pizza.
I visited the restaurant last weekend. The location is really pretty and the staff attended us well. But the pizza doe was terrible, gummy and hard to digest. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The best Pizzaria EVER in Amsterdam. The environment is cozy. Nice place to bring friends . The pizza itself is really delicious. Lovely day I had there. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: If you are looking for a great pizza in Amsterdam you won't be disappointed! I also tried the focaccia which was great too. And leave some space for their tiramisu!  Awesome! Great service also. Definetely recommended!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: We were excited to try this place. We went there Saturday around 5PM august 21. There was a blond server that just seemed to be very unhappy to be there. She was treating everyone like the client is bothering her. We almost left.  Luckily ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very nice pizzas with authentic Italian ingredients, fresh products and pretty big proportions. Open kitchen with fire oven. The place is nicely decorated and cosy, I like the building!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: One of the very best pizzas I've had anywhere ever. Still sitting here digesting and had to give it 5 stars

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very good pizza, and the side dishes are also very good and of generous proportions.  They have nice outside seating as well.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious pizza and nice place to sit.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Excellent pizza and dessert! Friendly staff, quaint atmosphere, and welcoming environment. Although, if I had to change one thing, I would suggest better music...maybe some old Sinatra to set the mood. It was just contrary to the setting. But highly recommend!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text:
pizza are great. we arrived at 4 pm (for late lunch) so there was nobody. we had the restaurant for ourselves. the design is nice.
the pizza are made with real pizza oven, the size is good. the menu offers great ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Best pizza I ever had! I wish I could eat there every day. I had the quattro staggioni pizza and it was great! The pizza dough was a perfect mix between doughy and crunchy -a bit of both! Tomato sauce was also great. Staff was super friendly. I highly recommend!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious pizza and great service!! I'm really happy I've found this place, now I wanna try the other pizzas they have. Make sure you also try the Tiramisu, it's very tasty!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text:
Very nice place in Amsterdam. Ability to eat on site or to take away to eat at one of the swimming areas.
The pizzas are awesome and it's very easy to find something which fits your ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Excellent pizzas with fresh and good ingredients ! Few seats on the outside and it was really cool to enjoy the sun at this moment ! The waitress was really lovely and careful. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Good pizza! Not the best I have eaten but quality oven. The waiters could be a little more friendly especially when it isn't that busy.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Amazing pizza! Consistent each and every time. The staff are wonderful and make you feel so welcomed and at home. Especially Sofie! Kind and always smiling! FANTASTIC all around.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Perfect for bigger groups. Very good pizza made in a proper oven.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Unmasked staff asks customers to wear a mask. When we asked if they didn't need to wear a mask the lady just shrugged. Way to be an example ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüëèüèΩ

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizzas were really nice with some different flavors. The only problem for me, as a traveler who pays lots of taxes shopping abroad in credit cards, is that they only accept cards =/

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Super delicious pizza! One of the best I ever tried

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Hands down best pizza of Amsterdam. Wonderful!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Super fresh and great taste! Friendly staff and did I mention the amazing flavours... I'm from Antwerp and am now Jealous of Amsterdam...

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Looks better in the pictures than I reality. Very average yet pretends to be high quality by using D.O.P mozzarella. Service wasn‚Äôt good and they didn‚Äôt serve us any water. The kitchen service looked chaotic.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very friendly staff and good Neapolitan pizza. Very few beer selection

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizza was very good, nice and soft dough and good ingredients. Recommend to book a table for dinner since if you come after 7pm everything is normally reserved. We came early so were still able to sit.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text:
Ordered a pizza and a tiramis√π through a food delivery app from this "restaurant".
The tiramis√π was not delivered and the pizza received was literally uneatable ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Nice place with kind service. Pizza is good and with good ingredients. Definitely above the average in Amsterdam. Also tiramisu is nice and this was a surprise. Better than many places in Italy.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Yummy! These are very tasty pizza! The service was fast and friendly staff. Highly recommended

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very quaint, well priced and quality pizza. Important to note they don't take cash, only card. Great atmosphere and very friendly staff though.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: I just can say it‚Äôs the best pizza restaurant in Amsterdam

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Absolutely incredible authentic Italian pizza so quick and delicious! I cannot recommend them enough!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Opened in November of 2017. This wood fired pizzeria has authentic Italian style and feel just steps away from the central district. Serving very locally brewed beer from just down the way.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Killer options and really delightful staff. The pesto drizzle on white was the favorite, but I doubt you could go wrong with the ecclectic menu!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very good pizzas & very quick service. We said we had a plane to catch & we got the pizza less than 5 minutes later. It was perfect

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious thin pizza, and lovely friendly staff. 4 years of being a loyal customer. Sotto forever and beyond.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: We had an amazing experience at Sotto. Not only is the pizza delicious, but the service was outstanding. The waitress and chef went out of their way to accomodate our veggetarian preferences, and were overall very friendly. We're coming back for sure!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: One of the best pizzerias in Amsterdam. Friendly staff and mega fresh ingredients. Definitely a pizza spot!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Wonderful pizza and a great atmosphere. Make a reservation to make sure you can get a spot.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Decent pizza. Nice environment, staff.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The staff is really nice and helpful. The pizzas are made by an authentic Italian. The tomato sauce is delicious. Can improve the wine menu though. Thanks :) looking forward to visiting you again.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Best Panini ever if you are near Sotto then make sure you try it out and if you are not near here then ask yourself why not this is a must.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text:
Good place for pizza;
High recommendation for reservation.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great pizza. A little understaffed for a Thursday night but a lovely spot and we‚Äôll definitely be back.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: This is one of the best pizzas I‚Äôve eaten in my life.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Tasty pizzas and desert. Great service. I recommend!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Amazing pizza and cozy environment. One of the best ones you can find in Amsterdam. The location is very good as well.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Beautiful pizza, tasty beers, good prices! Had the prosciutto and it was really nice. A good size. Can't fault this place at all. Also someone had a balloon shaped like a sausage dog in the restaurant, as it was their birthday. Really added to the ambiance

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: I ordered a pizza and this is what I received. It went straight to the trash. Anyone has the number of "Kitchen Nightmares ? . A pizza from a supermarket looks and tastes better than that.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Picked-up two undercooked pizza's, cheese didn't bind because of how undercooked it was. Whole box was soggy once we arrived home. Check the pizza once they go out of the oven.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Been all over the world, and this is the best Pizza me and my wife have ever had

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Wasn't able to grab a table because of covid-19, but the pizza was great! Friendly staff to, specialty the pizzaiolo. The place looks comfy and clean, will definitely pay a visit to have a proper dinner inside when possible.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very good pizza! Fresh ingredients and real italian chef!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: So disappointing. I am not even sure how both our pizzas had such burnt bubbles and yet parts undercooked at the same time?!  The pepperoni pizza was terribly, terribly salty. The waitress had an unpleasant attitude from the start so we ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Found this in the list of top 10 pizza places in Amsterdam. Not one of the best pizza's of my life - the base was too soft and soggy for me, I like it a little crisp and cooked. Otherwise, the taste was not bad. You get exactly what's ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Worth going out of your way for if you're in Amsterdam. Best pizza in the Netherlands, hands down!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious pizzas, found it listed on a Timeout article and tried it out when we stopped in Amsterdam. Would happily go again. Menu was all in Dutch but the waitress happily helped us out with what everything was on the menu. Lovely vibe

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great place for pizza close to Central, with very Nice staff!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: One of my favorite pizza place in Amsterdam. I really like their pizze. Especially the dough is very good and products they use are fresh and tasty. It can get really crowded so might be cool to book in advance. They have few tables outside also, which is nice in summer. Truffle pizza should be tried!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious Pizza but the service was a bit slow. Still great experience!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: What a epic pizza place near Amsterdam center! The pizzas are true Napolitan style and are served super fast. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Quality food, cheese was a little scarce on the pizza however the flavor was excellent on the truffle and anchovy. Would have received a 4/5, however there was a mishap with the waitress and glass was dropped on our table, as well as in my cappuccino. Would have even been a 3/5 but the waiter never wanted to take our dessert order.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text:
Went twice, second time was definitely  better.
We were able to squeeze in before a reservation and had plenty of time to finish what we ordered. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizzas were delicious, much more authentic tasting than many in Amsterdam. Service was quick. I also tried the brownie off the dessert menu and it was delicious. The menu isn't huge but there's a good variety of different options, and ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great Italian pizza, nice space and good price. And the tiramisu was awesome too!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizza was absolutely amazing. We tried 2 different ones and even the one not meeting my taste I still considered way above average. The pizza is priced very well considering they mainly use D.O.P products. A small deduction since my company noted that the bathroom facilities were dirty.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great  pizza! The tiramisu is delicious.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizzas are quite delicious and come highly recommended. Great spot for lunch.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Finally found a good pizza place close by! Love the decor, accessibility and prices of this joint. The staff is helpful and on my first visit I could even get a table without having a reservation. Please understand that this is uncommon, one should actually call for reservation beforehand, as in any place in Amsterdam.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Do you see the sad minuscule slice of eggplant in the center of the pizza? This is the extra eggplant I paid 1.50 ‚Ç¨ for. After this letdown I highly suspect this isn‚Äôt the first time the employees of SOTTO have disappointed others with the size of their eggplant.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Nice restaurant, the food is pretty good, with a relatively low price for Holland. The menu is mostly just pizzas. The food is nice, but when we ordered it came extremely quickly (10 minutes after sitting down at our table) this isn't ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great pizza but I‚Äôve gotta give this place a poor rating based on hygiene. No soap at all in the sole restroom - staff said they had missed a delivery and that we should avoid touching our food if we were concerned about it. It‚Äôs bad enough ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Had four cheese pizza. Taste of blue cheese was overpowering, it was the only thing i could taste. Tomato sauce and cheese ratio was so off, it felt I was eating a soup out of leater shoe as the base was chewy. At 10 pm the atmosphere was tense - everyone was very keen to get off on time and were already cleaning everything.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Superb pizza, desserts and wine served by friendly and attentive staff

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious pizzas and home made tiramisu, great atmosphere and super friendly staff.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text:
Not a huge pizza fan although this was a phenomenal experience.

Book ahead the place fills up at night we just managed to squeeze onto a big ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Busy little local pizza joint. Antipasti was superb. Margarita pizza was just right, crisp crust lively sauce. Good enough you won‚Äôt let it sit long enough to get soggy.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Tasty pizza with authentic ingredients.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Would reccomend to anyone. Some of the best pizza I've ever had, in a lovely little joint with friendly staff and chilled music. Very reasonably priced, particularly given the area. 11/10 would go again.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Total scam. Don't look at the pictures they posted.. with the stupid star-shape initiative, my almost 17‚Ç¨ pizza was literally 20x20cm and with very little space for anything on top of it. When I asked for explanations, I annoyed the waiter ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious Pizza, nice Lokation and friendly Stuff. Highly Recommend it üëç

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Super friendly service. Delicious pizza. Short and effective wine list. Cosy atmosphere inside. It is a great address. I absolutely recommand.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Pizza burned and dry outside and soggy and mushed up on inside part. I just hated the acoustics of the place, I was overcharged for someone's pizza and the taste was nothing extraordinary let alone the eating experience being terrible. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Best pizza in the city. Also huissalade is great and antipasta. Sometimes you have to wait for food, but all the rest is great. We are coming here quite frequently with friends and love that place.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Good Naples style pizza in a nice location and space.  Like most good neapolitan pizza, the flavor and consistency of the dough and crust has a 5 minute half-life once it leaves the wood fire oven, meaning you have 5 minutes to eat it ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Excellent pizza despite the standard Amsterdam service levels. They will get to you eventually, even if you are the only customer present, the staff clearly have better things to do then rush to get your order.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Excellent pizza, good chewy Neapolitan base, great staff, decent price.  If you don't want to or can't book to sit in, do yourself a favour and get a takeout at least.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Fantastic authentic italian pizza: delicious dough and tomato sauce. Polite staff and cosy interior too. Open on Sunday all day long.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Amazing hidden gem in a very quiet corner in the city centre. Not many options in the menu, but you do not need anything more. Pizza is amazing, authentic Italian, and a delicious Panna Cotta too.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text:
Too expensive. Moreover pizzas are very small, if you are hungry you have to eat at least 2 pizzas. Maybe for a baby one is enough. Taste is normal.
For sure i wont buy a pizza from them anymore!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Ordered 3 Porcini pizzas (16.50 euros each) and got very small star shaped ones (20cm by 20cm each) with very low amount of seasoning and no Porcini at all. Table in front of the toilet as well and drowsy waiter. Btw, update increased prices in your online menu.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very nice authentic Italian pizza in the centre of Amsterdam! The pizza was crispy, the ingredients fresh with a good selection of pizza to choose from the menu. Highly recommended

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Real Neapolitan pizza from the wood fired oven! Can't beat it. It's light and tasty. This particular Sotto location is close to Central Station and Nemo. Reserving is a good idea.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Lovely pizza and tiramisu. Shame there is no terrace but food is great.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Best pizza and good selection of drinks!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizza with ricotta in the borders is really nice, also the focaccia. A little disorganized. Very bad coffee. Nice people, taking care of the guests.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Traditional pizza oven delivering quality dishes with a nice atmosphere!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Pizza was just ok,not the original napoletana as the ingredients were very poor and the said mozzarella di bufala was definitely not the real deal,at least the tiramis√π was good.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Awesome! Delicious Italian pizza, very nice place, super kind service. Maybe not the cheapest, but it is for sure to try if you want a good pizza in Amsterdam.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Amazing pizza, very tasty, price is reasonable. The place is a bit far from city center, but it's worth visiting at least once

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizza is delicious! Definitely in my top three pizzas I've ever had. Staff are quick and professional too. Definitely recommend

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Best pizza in Amsterdam

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great authentic pizza

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: As a south Italian, I must say Sotto Pizza has the best Neapolitan-style pizza I've ever had in Amsterdam! Shockingly delicious!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizza is super good and very similar to the italian one. The service is fast and the waiters are nice and kind. You should go!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Excellent neopolitan style pizza. Most of the reviews I have read of this place are written by people that don't understand what they are eating.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: A great hole-in-the-wall place on a nice walk between the zoo or the Jewish quarter and the Maritime Museum or the central station. Delicious pizza and friendly staff.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Fast service, good pizza üçï

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Loved the food, atmosphere and the service here. The tiramisu was probably one of the best I've had in my life üòç would highly recommend!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: I can recommend the focaccia with the salad. Simple and very tasty. We‚Äôve been here twice and it was always very delicious. The staff was friendly. Prices were Ok.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great pizza, great personal, great Italian vibe!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Beautiful and tasty place. Nice staff

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Absolutely amazing, authentic Italian margarita style pizza. Tastes just like they do it back in NYC!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: I really do like this place. The pizza taste great and the service is very friendly and quick.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great, fresh and tasty pizza. Good value + excellent service from friendly staff

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: It was good but it does take a while. Crust was delicious and the cheese was also delightful. The marinara was going but lacked something.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very tasteful pizza, friendly staff, would give it 5 stars but the size is small which makes conversation a bit difficult

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: This is the real deal, only in Italy I‚Äôve had pizza lije this.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious, light and flavoursome pizza. Friendly staff and cooked fresh.  Would go back everyday!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great, fresh and tasty pizza. Good value + excellent service from friendly staff

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizza is super good and very similar to the italian one. The service is fast and the waiters are nice and kind. You should go!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Best pizza place in Amsterdam, I've been to Italy and for sure the pizza is similar to what I had in Italy, I believe the chef is Italian

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Amazing pizza! Staff and surroundings also amazing 5 stars all round

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Tasty, Italian style pizza. Reasonably priced and just outside the busy tourist area

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Nice Pizza + Atmosphere - super fast with 10 people serving nearly at the same time

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Pizza burned and dry outside and soggy and mushed up on inside part. I just hated the acoustics of the place, I was overcharged for someone's pizza and the taste was nothing extraordinary let alone the eating experience being terrible. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Disappointing, if one expects a true Neapolitan pizza. Otherwise, better then other pizza joints. A good excuse to walk away from the touristic city centre.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: The pizza with ricotta in the borders is really nice, also the focaccia. A little disorganized. Very bad coffee. Nice people, taking care of the guests.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Real Neapolitan pizza from the wood fired oven! Can't beat it. It's light and tasty. This particular Sotto location is close to Central Station and Nemo. Reserving is a good idea.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious Neapolitan pizza! Fresh ingredients, very nice and tasty dough, I definetely recommend this place! üî•üëç

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: It was sold to me as the best pizza place in Amsterdam but I find that overrated. Pizza is OK, the place looks nice but is actually very noisy.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: I liked the food here, and would come back for it. Service and pricing was generally okay. Be ready with your card, they don't take cash.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Delicious pizza and good wine. But the staff is a little unattentive when it comes to taking orders.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Nice Pizza + Atmosphere - super fast with 10 people serving nearly at the same time

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Our favourite go-to-pizzeria around the corner! Nice staff, nice pizza and nice tiramisu!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Pizza is good but a bit overpriced, the fact that the only selection for beer is a small glass means they want to milk the customer, so be advised

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Most authentic pizza you can find in Amsterdam in my opinion. Stone-oven baked.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: I like especially the location. The pizza are nice, even my Italian friends like them.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Tasty, Italian style pizza. Reasonably priced and just outside the busy tourist area

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: If you love pizza this is a MUST!! Their pizzas are insane and if ever back in Dam I'll be coming back for sure!!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very good authentic pizza, not enough cheese though! Very kind and friendly staff.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Amazing food. As close to Authentic Neapolitan pizza as we‚Äôve found in Amsterdam!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great food and friendly people! Can't wait for the restaurant to open again for full service.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Good service, nice place. The food (pizza) was tasty but could have been better.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Friendly staff and nice atmosphere, amazing pizza. Would definitely return here.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Best pizzas I ve ever tasted !

Review Text: The service was good and quick, the pizza was amazing, really high quality. plus, they are flexible with the supplements

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Terrific pizza, very friendly and attentive staff in a cosy atmosphere

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great pizza and lovely service, and the prices are very reasonable!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Still one of the best pizza places in Amsterdam. Thoroughly recommend it!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great thin crust pizza a step above other pizza shops in the area. Smaller place and does get crowded.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Amazing service, even when there was an mistake from ubereats they still solved it in no time. And the pizza is deliciousl!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: One of the best pizza ever! Very friendly staff.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Great pizza's! Definitely the best I had in Amsterdam üëå

Review Text: Nice small place with lovely pizzas.

Name: Sotto Pizzeria

Review Text: Great pizza and staff was very friendly and welcoming

Review Text: Great pizza, fit us in without reservation, wifi.

Review Text: Great pizza, but a bit small for that price

Review Text: Super pizza wery nice stuf all the best!

Name: Sotto Pizzeria
Review Text: Very, very good pizza and quality service.

Review Text: Pizza it is. Don't drink the Prosecco, have the red wine instead.
